events.name: Alabama Crimson Tide at Clemson Tigers

headlines.description: A pair of Alabama defensive players scored touchdowns 13 seconds apart in the third quarter, and the No. 4 Crimson Tide dominated top-ranked Clemson 24-6 in the Sugar Bowl semifinal game Monday night to give coach Nick Saban another shot at his record...
headlines.shortLinkText: No. 4 Alabama dominates No. 1 Clemson 24-6 in Sugar Bowl

video.headline: Alabama rolls past Clemson in Sugar Bowl

tracking.trackingName: COM_NCF Highlight (Alabama rolls past Clemson in Sugar Bowl) 2018/1/1 ESHEET

notes.headline: Rose Bowl Game Presented by Northwestern Mutual - CFB Semifinal

headlines.description: Sony Michel burst through the line for a 27-yard touchdown run to give No. 3 Georgia a 54-48 victory Monday night against No. 2 Oklahoma, winning the first overtime Rose Bowl and sending the Bulldogs to the College Football Playoff championship game.
headlines.shortLinkText: Georgia beats Oklahoma 54-48 in Rose Bowl

headlines.description: McKenzie Milton threw two touchdown passes and ran for 116 yards with another touchdown, leading No. 12 Central Florida to a 34-27 Peach Bowl win over No. 7 Auburn on Monday that capped the Knights' perfect season.
headlines.shortLinkText: Milton powers No. 12 UCF to 34-27 Peach Bowl win over Auburn

video.headline: UCF completes undefeated season with win over Auburn

events.name: Notre Dame Fighting Irish at LSU Tigers

headlines.description: Miles Boykin scored on a 55-yard touchdown pass with 1:28 remaining and No. 14 Notre Dame got its first win in a New Year's Day bowl since 1994 with a 21-17 win over No. 16 LSU in the Citrus Bowl on Monday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Boykin rallies Notre Dame to Citrus Bowl win over LSU

video.headline: Boykin reels in outrageous 1-handed TD catch

events.name: Michigan Wolverines at South Carolina Gamecocks

headlines.description: Jake Bentley threw for 239 yards and two touchdowns Monday to help South Carolina overcome a 16-point second-half deficit to beat Michigan 26-19 in the Outback Bowl.
headlines.shortLinkText: Bentley leads South Carolina past Michigan 26-19 in Outback

video.headline: South Carolina rallies to beat Michigan in Outback Bowl
